answers.answer: I don't know about "press" but I think you should discuss with you doctor for sure.  Dizziness/vertigo can cause a serious accident.FYI, your profile shows you as a male, you post says female.  Not a big deal, but you may want to correct your profile if it is in error.

question: Hello.  I'm a 53 yr.  old female.  Type II diabetes for 9 yrs.  I have frequent unifocal PVCs, often in quadrigeminy or trigeminy. I've known about this since my 20s.  I have had episodes of SVT in the past as well.  On occasion I have episodes of dizziness/vertigo which are brief.  No chest pain. Is this something I need to press my doc to pursue?  Or do you feel it's a normal variant?  Thank you!
title: Frequent PVCs
